data.sentence: The word وَأَزْلَفْنَا comes from the root ز ل ف and is associated with the meanings: draw near/close, advance, nearness/closeness/proximity

data.meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
data.sentence: The word الْءَاخَرِينَ comes from the root ا خ ر and is associated with the meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
